title: How to exit from commedk?
content:
I have got a seat through pessat and for backup I had participated in comedk counselling. Till now I was not alloted any seat so I would like to exit from the counselling.

How to exit from it?

comments.body: What's your comedk Rank and PESSAT Rank
Comedk was 39k and pes 4k..how to exit tho?
If you don't get any clg next round you will exit automatically
Bt what if I get, bcoz then i cannot exit in R3 its already stated in the counselling guide of comedk
There will be edit option before round 3, just remove all colleges from choice filling tab
nice so i am not the only one who did very shit in comedk but fine in other exams
